display_long_description:
90s, outbreak of mass psychosis occurs on the B-movie set. Actors, fully dressed up in costumes start to murder each other. The wave of evil was so big, it has summoned the demon which possesed the main star of the movie – Rinona Wider. 

Beautiful woman became evil, powerful and immortal. She captured you, and made you her husband and slave. The movie set becomes the real hell on earth. You land in a creepy castle with mummies and other monsters running around (and nobody knows where they are coming from). 

Your wife orders you to clean all of this mess and you do it – because insubordination is punished with a painful death. But when she goes to sleep, it’s time for you to explore new locations and hunt for monsters in the garden.. There must be freedom hiding somewhere!

Prepare yourself for the funny scary ride spiced with 90s nostalgia.

Key Features:
The atmosphere of 90s games
Horror+comedy+simulator!
FPS elements
5 hours of gameplay minimum
Rinona Wider!
